div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: title: Acoustic Tasks Neuro Cohort Protocol
description: This is a plandefinition for Acoustic Tasks Neuro cohort protocol

blockquote.p: description: Have participant complete MoCA Test

description: You will be shown a word (one of 5 colour words - red, green, blue, brown, purple; such as ‘blue’, or a baseline stimulus, ‘oooo’), which is displayed in a congruent or incongruent colour (one of 5 colour stimuli). You have to name the colour in which the word is displayed. (no time limit)
definition: Stroop Questionniare for Neuro Cohort
description: You will be shown a target word. You will have to provide a definition for it (no time limit).
title: Random item generation / semantic fluency link:

description: You will have to speak a series of (I) random, non-repeating letters or numbers, or (ii) items from a given category (e.g., cities, animals, etc.), with the goal of maximizing the number of items. (time limit: 60 seconds).
description: Read each sentence, and answer the question by selecting one of the options

description.value: This is a plandefinition for Acoustic Tasks Neuro cohort protocol

You will be shown a word (one of 5 colour words - red, green, blue, brown, purple; such as ‘blue’, or a baseline stimulus, ‘oooo’), which is displayed in a congruent or incongruent colour (one of 5 colour stimuli). You have to name the colour in which the word is displayed. (no time limit)
You will be shown a target word. You will have to provide a definition for it (no time limit).

title.value: Random item generation / semantic fluency link:

description.value: You will have to speak a series of (I) random, non-repeating letters or numbers, or (ii) items from a given category (e.g., cities, animals, etc.), with the goal of maximizing the number of items. (time limit: 60 seconds).
Read each sentence, and answer the question by selecting one of the options
